DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate importance skin type UV-exposure side effect exposure Intense Pulsed Light Home-use device . 21 healthy subject receive 8 UV-exposures one buttock subsequently three weekly IPL-exposures .
DOC.brief_title: Pigment-Tan-Safety Study Light-based Home Device Hair Removal Adult Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty-one healthy subject expose UV-exposures 8 time 3 week test-area ( 4 x 6cm ) one buttock induce pigmentation . This follow 3 weekly IPL ( intense pulse light ) exposures . At 24 hour first IPL exposure , biopsy excise buttock subject ( 4 ) .The skin evaluate IPL exposure : skin reaction , pain mRNA expression two pigment marker . Follow-up visit plan 1 4 week third final IPL exposure .
